item.title: The Risks of Using VPNs Unnecessarily: A Guide for Standard Users
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "VPN" , "Online Privacy" , "Internet Security" , "MITM Attacks" , "Virtual Private Networks" , "Cybersecurity" , "Online Safety" , "Encryption" , "HTTPS" , "Data Protection" , "Third-party Services" , "Privacy Risks" , "ISP" , "Geo-restricted Content" , "Internet Censorship" , "Public Wi-Fi" , "Data Privacy" , "Online Protection" , "Web Security" , "VPN Providers"
item.description: Discover why VPNs may not be useful for standard users in a world where everything uses HTTPS and how to trust your VPN provider.
